Job Posting:170463 - Position: S25 Software Engineer (Web Applications) 170463B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/09/2025 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 06/06/2025 12:24 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country Casefleet Vancouver BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Duration: 8 months 2025 - Summer S25 Software Engineer (Web Applications) 170463B Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 8 months In-Person CAD 0.0 per hour for 40 Major List 40,000 - 50,000 Join our dynamic and fully remote team dedicated to developing innovative applications that assist legal and investigative professionals in reviewing documents and creating chronologies. We pride ourselves on leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver exceptional solutions. Our frontend is built with Ember.js, utilizing the latest features, while our backend is powered by Django and handful of other other technologies, including AI integrations. We are seeking a motivated Junior Developer who is either a current Computer Science student or a recent graduate. The ideal candidate is hard-working, passionate about software development, and eager to contribute to meaningful projects. Key Responsibilities: • Collaborate with senior developers to build new features and enhance existing ones. • Resolve tickets and troubleshoot issues within our applications. • Participate in modernizing our codebase for improved performance and scalability. • Contribute to both frontend and backend development tasks. Tech Stack You'll Work With: • Frontend: Ember.js, JavaScript, TypeScript • Backend: Python, Django • Databases: PostgreSQL • Search Engines: Elasticsearch • DevOps & Tools: Docker, Terraform • Other Opportunities: Help work on AI solutions and LLM integrations. Read more about our product at https://www.casefleet.com/ Job Requirements Qualifications: • Experience with Python, Javascript, or other relevant functional / multi-paradigm languages. • Familiarity with Git and GitHub workflows. • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. • Ability to work independently and complete projects with minimal supervision. • Excellent communication skills. • A Criminal Record Check is required. What We Offer: • Hands-on experience with modern technologies and frameworks. • Mentorship from senior developers. • Flexible hours to accommodate a busy student's schedule. • A collaborative and supportive work environment. Opportunities for professional growth and learning. • Citizenship Requirement Canadian & Permanent Residents Only APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Address Cover Letter to Optional Jeff Kerr
